text: Agdistis frankeniae is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is found from Siberia through Central Asia, the northern parts of Asia and North Africa along the Mediterranean and in the west from the Canary Islands to southern France.A new species, a new synonym, and new distribution records in the genus Agdistis Hübner, 1825 from Iran (Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) The wingspan is about 29 mm. The larvae feed on Limonium minutum and Frankenia species. ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths of Europe Category:Moths described in 1847 Category:Moths of Turkey Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths of Asia
title: Agdistis frankeniae
